website_summaries.verdict: Look no further if headphone cords annoy you mid-run.
pros: Special flap to wrap cords around
Waterproof and no openings in back, so phone won't be damaged by perspiration
Users rave it's unfazed by temperatures over 100°
For several iPhone and Galaxy models

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected but it can be a struggle to ...
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected but it can be a struggle to remove the phone from the band. After a little bit of sweat the plastic screen tends to stick to the glass face. Not sure what can be done about that. Hoping in time the plastic looses its adhesion.
customer_reviews.author: Roman

customer_reviews.title: Great armband for running
customer_reviews.text: Can’t say enough good things about this armband. I had one for my iPhone 5s and just bought again for my new iPhone 7. The charts on their website are great for figuring out the correct case, plus they take into account the size of your protective case. I run a lot and the armband has held up great. My only complaint is with Apple. Since they changed the home button to require an actual finger to click it, it’s not as easy to use my phone in the armband. But the armband came with instructions to get around it by enabling assistive touch. Thanks tunebelt.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Shapiro

customer_reviews.title: So far the Tune Belt band is one of the best that I have used
customer_reviews.text: I am using the cover for an iPhone 6S. I have had other brand arm bands in the past which have torn and did not last long. So far the Tune Belt band is one of the best that I have used. Some other covers also made it difficult to use the screen due to the plastic cover however I have not had any issues with the Tune Belt band. The headphone cord option makes running much easier. The only downfall is that the arm band was a little small for my arm however Tune Belt is sending me a band extender. I would definitely purchase this item again.
customer_reviews.author: GHazerg

customer_reviews.title: Finally Found a Good One!
customer_reviews.text: I use this with a Galaxy S5. It fits great and appears to be very well made. The soft cloth on the sides allows me to control the side volume button and screen activator button without fumbling and accidentally hitting the wrong one. Much better than the two other armbands I purchased before this one! I just wish it came in white!
customer_reviews.author: J. Kaufman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Arm Band
customer_reviews.text: Very nice material. Holds my iPhone Xs with ease. Works snug with the thin Apple cases, but even better if I just take my phone out of the case before using the arm band. Works flawless when running. You are able to use the screen through the protective plastic as well. I would recommend this arm band.
customer_reviews.author: Asphaltman

customer_reviews.title: Major Downgrade From My Last Armband
customer_reviews.text: I just acquired a new iPhone and needed a larger armband for runs. Wirecutter sent me here; not the first (and probably not the last) time that Wirecutter has let me down. This thing is beyond cheap; forget about running in any kind of inclement weather. There is no zipper around the top, there's a hole over the home button, the armband materials are thin and uncomfortable, the plastic over the screen is flimsy and warped out of the box. (Er, plastic bag.) If I had purchased this for 5 bucks from a street vendor I'd consider it money well spent, but for $20 you'd be better off splurging for a better quality product. Avoid at all costs.
customer_reviews.author: Bongo

customer_reviews.title: Home button doesn't have functionality for a 6 or 7 but I like the case
customer_reviews.text: The home button doesn't work through the case for the 6 or 7. But I have had this product for my other iPhones and liked that is is light, comfortable and durable so I just cut a hole for my thumb. That may be annoying but I'm fine with it. I know many of the cases don't have home button functionality for the 6 or 7 through the protector.
customer_reviews.author: Elcee33

customer_reviews.title: I use this product for training for 1/2 Marathons. ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this product for training for 1/2 Marathons. I have tried other lower price point bands and have returned all of them due to their rigidity and not "feeling" right on the arm. This product sits well. Stays put. Breathes well......5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Dedikit

customer_reviews.title: but again feels a bit on the cheaper side and doesn't seem like it will last too long
customer_reviews.text: It does it's job of holding my phone securely during my runs. When I use corded earbuds, the small flap on the side does well in holding the extra slack of the cord. The velcro material seems a bit cheap as after 6 uses, the soft part of the velcro is showing more wear than I'd have expected. Overall material is soft, but again feels a bit on the cheaper side and doesn't seem like it will last too long. Only time will tell. Sweat absorption is good though. Overall, I'm satisfied with the band.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Kind of annoying..
customer_reviews.text: It says on here that your phone will fit with a case on it, not true.. my husband has to take his case off to use this every time, he has an iPhone 7, Kind of annoying... and not worth it to try to return..
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Good running case for iPhone
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product. Sturdy and well made. So far no issues. I'm giving it 4 stars only because it's not as easy to remove the phone from it after I'm done using it but that's picky. Overall, I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Drumming Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Enjoy it!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, fits my Galaxy S4 with an extended battery and case, however the clear window does not fit snug and is very wrinkly and makes using the phone a bit harder. But it does get the job done, stays in place. I bought it for running but i use it all the time now......I don't drop the phone any more!
customer_reviews.author: T. Castillo

customer_reviews.title: Replacement is awesome
customer_reviews.text: Bought one that was too big originally. Iced used this brand for years and never needed a replacement but when we moved i never found my old one. A great price for a replacement
customer_reviews.author: NCJen

customer_reviews.title: Not good with an iPhone 6 Lifeproof Fre Case
customer_reviews.text: Not happy with this armband with an iPhone 6 with a Lifeproof Fre case. The Lifeproof already has a protective screen. Now combined with the armband 's protective screen, it basically makes the touch screen useless. They need to make a case that fits snugly around the iPhone but allows free access to the screen. I wanted to use this while recording workouts on the device, etc
customer_reviews.author: TRF

customer_reviews.title: Fits iphone 6 with Speck Candyshell Grip case
customer_reviews.text: After buying and returning two other Tune Belt Armbands that were labeled on Amazon for the iPhone 6 but did not fit, I finally found the info I needed on the Tune Belt website. If you go there they have a chart that tells you which model of Armband will fit depending on your make of smartphone and case. This fits the iPhone 6 with my Speck Grip case and slides in and and out well enough. I wish that the plastic laid a little more flat against the screen, but it works. I am able to control the phone through the plastic and the armband is comfortable, so I am satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M

customer_reviews.title: They go the extra mile
customer_reviews.text: Initially I was not happy with product. I thought I had purchased the correct one for my phone and it did not fit. A representative from the company contacted me a d asked a few questions. She then sent me a new case free of charge. Now with the proper case my phone fits perfect. This is an awesome, durable case. The company is great too.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Continued Product Improvement
customer_reviews.text: This is my second tune belt. The first one was still good after a few years of use but I lost it. They have made some sublte yet beneficial changes the product so it's nice to see they are dedicated to continually improving the product. The first one was very durable, and this one appears to be up to the same standards, but time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Devin Reise

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Perfect!! I have been looking for an armband hat would hold my phone in its case, and this is the first one that actually did. Glad I found it! (I have the Speck Candy shell case with the iPhone 6.) A bit of a warning - it does get sweaty while exercising if it is against your skin, but I can't imagine there is any product that wouldn't.
customer_reviews.author: JPetree

customer_reviews.title: Great armband for working out! Device is held securely and yet easily accessible.
customer_reviews.text: Great armband for working out and having your phone available. The phone easily slides in the top and the touchscreen is accessible through the clear front panel. Even when running the armband is very secure and comfortable. I generally use a Bluetooth headset but I have used a wired headset which is easily attached through the access hole in the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: MacInTX

customer_reviews.title: Not a fit for Galaxy 5
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made case and armband fits perfectly, however it does not fit a Samsung Galaxy 5. I could not even get it in the slot. Would definitely fit a smaller iphone, probably not the newer version. I have an ultra slim cover for the Galaxy 5 and there's no way it would fit. I don't even think it would fit without the case. Had to return.
customer_reviews.author: prettypak

customer_reviews.title: touch screen works just fine. It doesn't make me run faster
customer_reviews.text: meh. It IS waterproof, sweatproof. fits my iphone 5 with case on it. touch screen works just fine. It doesn't make me run faster, lol. The fit isn't absolutely perfect, it is slightly annoying to put on and take off. I think that is personal preference, as I can get it on / off in less than a second. It is the best I could find and I will use it for probably years.
customer_reviews.author: remf

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I was worried when buying an armband for my Droid DNA that the large plastic front would be wavy and look terrible. I can say that is not the case with this armband. The Droid DNA fits perfectly in this armband and the plastic front looks good when the armband is worn.
customer_reviews.author: Quotidian Void

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly with a iPhone 5s Life Proof case
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my iPhone 5s with a Life Proof case. The screwed plug for the headphone jack sneaks out the bottom side opening and the headphone jack fits through the pre-made hole, so the phone with case, fits well and flush against the bottom. I had their iPhone4 armband and I was very happy! It fits well around my arms (10") and it is very comfortable. The arm band does not budge.
customer_reviews.author: CaliSmock

customer_reviews.title: I purched this because it was supposed to fit the ...
customer_reviews.text: I purched this because it was supposed to fit the iphone with a life proof case. It does but it it is a little snug which I am sure it will stretch a little. My only complaint is that it is hard to push the home button to be able to change songs. Other than that its great
customer_reviews.author: Zack

customer_reviews.title: gets it done
customer_reviews.text: plastic cover is tough to see thru and operate thru
customer_reviews.author: Chum

customer_reviews.title: I can easily swipe my phone screen when its inside the armband
customer_reviews.text: My iphone 6s fits into the armband very well. I can easily swipe my phone screen when its inside the armband, great! The only cons is that as compared to my previous tune belt armband, I realised that this one has a weaker Velcro power when I try to secure it. My old Tune Belt armband has a better velcro secure strength.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is wonderful! My boyfriend had it and recommended it to ...
customer_reviews.text: This is wonderful! My boyfriend had it and recommended it to me. I have the iPhone 6 with the Ottorbox commuter case and it fits! It does fit snug, but I do not feel like it is too tight nor is it going to fall out while I am working out. When using the touch screen, there is no issues. So far I have had no issues with the velcro and do not feel it is going to fall off my arm when wearing it. I would highly recommend this product to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Katlyn Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Great running band
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for running. The cord wrap works great for the excess cords, my Lifeproof case fits in there perfectly, or if you don't have the case on, it really isn't too big either. And, the touchscreen works great through the protective cover. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: jessie5101

customer_reviews.title: Most Comfortable way to carry iPhone
customer_reviews.text: I have tried a number of iPhone carriers while running. The Tune Belt is by far the most comfortable. No issues using the touch screen of the phone. I have just ordered my second Tune Belt after my wife "permanently" borrowed my first one !
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Great for Galaxy S4 runners!
customer_reviews.text: This sport armband fits my Galaxy S4 very well although I had to purchase a smaller cover. I originally had a Lifeproof case but I couldn't find one that fit the bulky case. I am very pleased that it stays on my arm and doesn't slide down. I also like the built in feature on the side which neatly wraps the extra speaker cord. This keeps the cord out of my way when running. The plastic cover allows you to continue to control your phone in the armband however it's hard to see when on the side of your arm.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Alvarado

customer_reviews.title: not what i thought
customer_reviews.text: It does not fit my Galexy 6 with the Otter case. The phone with case is very very snug. Its almost a hassle to put the phone in the armband. There is not a place to put your key or id when you go running. I still use it because i paid for it but i am not a happy camper with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jazz

customer_reviews.title: Not made for iPhone 7
customer_reviews.text: This item does not work for an iPhone 7. Like many reviews I've read on similar products, this armband doesn't allow you to use the home button while in the case. It's been frustrating running without this capability. I'm currently using the Tunebelt armband that I had for my iPhone 5s, which of course doesn't fit either. It was also a tight squeeze getting my phone (with slim fit case) into the armband. I had to return this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This product was recommended by my friend who also purchased other brands from Amazon. Although it is more expensive than other products, it is high quality, washable and not causing skin itching . I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Great product, would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Love this arm band, works great with my iPhone 7. I use it for working out, working in the yard, horseback riding... anything that doesn’t allow easy back pocket storage.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Don't like it
customer_reviews.text: VERY difficult to get phone in and out of the case. I have a thin case on my phone which is made of rubber. Does not slide in or out easily. Also, the armband is not as stretchy as I would like and I am not able to tighten it comfortably. The placement of the velcro on the armband is in an awkward place which also makes it difficult to adjust. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Destry Jaimes

customer_reviews.title: The only one that fit my arm
customer_reviews.text: Great product delivered on time and above my expectations. I have huge arms and most armbands don't fit, I thought that I would need the extender but I didn't. Arms ovr 17"
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Best armband for your iPhone that has a case on it
customer_reviews.text: This is the third phone that I've bought this armband for and will keep coming back for more. I have a slim case on my phone and the phone with the case fits perfectly in the armband. I use this arm bad all the time, about 5 days a week for hiking, biking, lifting and the armband lasts a good 2 years with all the wear and tear I put it through.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable Arm Band for Running
customer_reviews.text: I have had several armbands and this one is by far the best. The material is very comfortable. I primarily use this while running outdoors and I have scars from other arm bands that have rubbed my arm raw. This Tune Belt doesn't hurt at all. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: runningmomPackersfan

customer_reviews.title: Great Armband
customer_reviews.text: Very nice armband, functions exactly as I expected and the extension band is a nice optional accessory. I use this product when I am mountain biking and it works flawlessly. Unfortunately I cannot find it at the moment so I may have to order another!
customer_reviews.author: Shredder

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Purchase for my son to use while playing basketball as I was tired of the many cracked screens resulting in his phone popping out of his pocket during jump shots & layups! Now he can practice with his tunes and the phone is safe!
customer_reviews.author: BoniB1

customer_reviews.title: I have an s5 with spigen slim case. It ...
customer_reviews.text: I have an s5 with spigen slim case. It fits but i have to force it in. At least dont have to worry about phone slipping off. Next time i will buy bigger one that fits with otterbox case size
customer_reviews.author: Uipt

customer_reviews.title: I had a Tune Belt for my iPod mini and love this one
customer_reviews.text: Holds my iPhone 5S in a LifeProof case really well. The holes in the bottom line up with the screw-in earbud adapter. I had a Tune Belt for my iPod mini and love this one, too. I had to re-snug it once during a long, sweaty run once, but I think it had more to do with dehydration than slippage. It can get a bit hot, but my screen is on the whole time using the Nike app, so I'm not convinced it was due to the neoprene.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Meudt

customer_reviews.title: The BEST on the market
customer_reviews.text: so comfy! love this armband, this is my 5th one, had to get a new one to accommodate larger size phone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My fave running arm band.
customer_reviews.text: Lost my first Tunebelt and was so sad REI no longer carried them, thank you AMAZON for having this product. My most favorite running arm band, i have small arms and it fits me! Also not so bulky and big like so many others!
customer_reviews.author: Dianalee

customer_reviews.title: I like this, but it is very snug on my ...
customer_reviews.text: I like this, but it is very snug on my LGG2 phone. Just FYI for people with that phone or bigger phones. It doesn't really fit, but it works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: I have used it at the gym, on a couple of races, and walking-jogging around town with my iPhone and it works great! I hardly notice it on actually. Holds a few cards & a key, too. Convenient & appears durable so far. 6 months old.
customer_reviews.author: Unfolding

customer_reviews.title: I have always used Tune Belt for running and love it. I still have to take the case ...
customer_reviews.text: I have always used Tune Belt for running and love it. I still have to take the case off my iPhoneX to use it but that's ok.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Boschen

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, does the job, but is not a solid product.
customer_reviews.text: Mediocre at best. The Neoprene like material is of decent quality, but the build, stitching and velcro of the product is somewhat... bad. After 2 uses, the velcro strap lost its "cling"
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Run Baby Run
customer_reviews.text: Fits my phone in the case. With the wireless, no longer need to cord flap. The plastic is thin enough to allow the phone to be touch but it does require some repeat selections.
customer_reviews.author: AccountinOnAmy

customer_reviews.title: Years in and I still love it.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for several years now and it still works great. I upgraded to a Samsung 5S and that still fits with a slim case on it. Very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Carlo

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: My sister just got a new iPhone 5 and wanted to get an armband to use while running. I got her this one, she has a life proof case on it and doesn't seem to have any issues fitting it into the armband.
customer_reviews.author: J. Rafalko

customer_reviews.title: Best armband, ever!
customer_reviews.text: Every time I get a new phone, I have to get a new armband..so over the years, I've had a few! This one is the best, ever! My iPhone 6, with it's case, slips right in and sits securely in it's cozy spot! The band is comfy..soft and flexible...yet strong and well put together..and I have full use of the phone! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Goetchius

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for bringing my S5 on runs - very comfortable and easy to use the touchscreen through the case.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: It's comfortable, adjusts well and fits, with my lifeproof case on. I like the Velcro to wrap up the cord so it doesn't fly everywhere when I run.
customer_reviews.author: K Taps

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I bought my second tunebelt only because I've had my first one for 5 years and is starting to stink some. Otherwise, there's nothing wrong with it. GREAT quality product
customer_reviews.author: Kelly koester

customer_reviews.title: Nexus 5 fits in just right. The strap is ...
customer_reviews.text: Nexus 5 fits in just right. The strap is a bit short so if you have seriously trained arms it might not go around. OK for most of us.
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: Fairly comfortable but kind of hard to use touch screen through ...
customer_reviews.text: Fairly comfortable but kind of hard to use touch screen through the neoprene cover. If I use the setting where my running app stays on during workouts, it works much better. My LG G2 fits pretty well
customer_reviews.author: Julianna Wermes

customer_reviews.title: Works great. I love tunebelt armbands.
customer_reviews.text: This product fits my iPhone 6 with commuter case still on. Works exactly like I intended it to.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: My phone doesn't fit in it and it doesn't stay in place. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Marlene Trumbo

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit iphone 5s with a Mophie case. ...
customer_reviews.text: Does not fit iphone 5s with a Mophie case. Phone sticks out the top and does not feel secure at all.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya S.

customer_reviews.title: i don't like the plastic to work my
customer_reviews.text: too small for my arm.i don't like the plastic to work my phone
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Not a good match for iPhone 6
customer_reviews.text: My iPhone 6 fits well within this holder, even with a Spigen Aluminum Slim Case, but the plastic cover does not allow to operate it properly.
customer_reviews.author: FLmiami

customer_reviews.title: Not for me...
customer_reviews.text: I had a iPhone 6 with a slender Otterbox phone case. It barely fit in the band. I had to upgrade to IPhone 7 and still with a slim case it doesn't fit! Also not able to use home button when the phone is in the band. :(
customer_reviews.author: Allison Scoville

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and easy to put on. Haven’t had it long enough to comment on durability.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Auger

customer_reviews.title: Fits my iPhone5 with Mophie Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I needed something to carry my iPhone with the Mophie case on it (I have the Mophie that carries a full extra battery charge)- this fits perfectly. The armbad does bounce around a bit because I wear it on my lower arm but all in all fits fine for light jogging and running. This is the only case I have found so far that fits. I gave it 4 stars only because occasionally the plastic touches the controls and pauses your music/running apps, but it is not that big of a deal. Fit was more important because it's very difficult to take the Mophie off my phone, so I am very satisfied with this.
customer_reviews.author: sunshiny299

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says it will very tight hard to ...
customer_reviews.text: Does what it says it will very tight hard to get out in a situation and wish it had a zipper at the top to see in for 100 percent surutt
customer_reviews.author: aaron

customer_reviews.title: Perfect I use it everything for sports second one to ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect I use it everything for sports second one to try after using for iPhone 5
customer_reviews.author: Mohamed  El Morr

customer_reviews.title: I'm not saying this product is bad if you intend to ride a bike
customer_reviews.text: I'm not saying this product is bad if you intend to ride a bike, or take long walks. It doesn't holds up in the gym, slides all over the place.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked great, kept the phone secure while doing all of my cardio and weight training.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Carter

customer_reviews.title: I had one just like this for my iPhone 4 and needed a new ...
customer_reviews.text: I had one just like this for my iPhone 4 and needed a new one when I upgraded to the iPhone 5. It works great with the slim case I have on it. It's durable and fits quite well.
customer_reviews.author: bj3152

customer_reviews.title: This is the best IPhone armband I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: This is the best IPhone armband I have ever used. This is my second one. Literally wore the first one out with as much I used it. Highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Using the armband with Otter Box will make for a tight fit and decrease access to key buttons. GalaxyS5
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great for my HTC One Remix (Also called the HTC ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my HTC One Remix (Also called the HTC One Mini 2). My HTC is in an Incipio case, and the fit in the tunebelt is snug. Small problem with the velcro snagging the threads on the band, but fairly normal with velcro in general.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Mcdonnell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: my wife love it, she use it with her galaxy s6 and iPhone 6
customer_reviews.author: JMAXIMEP

customer_reviews.title: Everything I want in an armband
customer_reviews.text: Bought this around a year ago when I got my new Nexus 5. I emailed Tune Belt and they helped me pick out the right size. It's indispensable on runs or at the gym. Seems like it'll last at least the life of the phone. A+!
customer_reviews.author: Big Red

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great and very comfortable. Used with iPhone and lifeproof case. Headphones fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth

customer_reviews.title: Not as waterproof as needed
customer_reviews.text: The arm band is supposed to be water proof. In running during the summer months, the case does not protect the phone from sweating as I expected it to.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits the iphone 6s perfectly. But a bit stiff and tricky to remove iphone from the case.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Works great. May have to put a little powder to ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great. May have to put a little powder to get it to slip on easily. Had a hard time but powder helped.
customer_reviews.author: Beepo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for running/gym.
customer_reviews.text: It fits my Samsung S5 Galaxy perfectly and snug when I run and does not pinch/hurt my arm. Exactly what I wanted!
customer_reviews.author: gitanatejana

customer_reviews.title: Fits a 6s with otterbox great. Bad quality.
customer_reviews.text: Stitching gave out very shortly after I began using it. Within a week it was in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin M Baker

customer_reviews.title: Perfect deal for the price
customer_reviews.text: Fits my iphone 5S with Lifeproof case; doesn't chafe my arm; suits my needs perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Lissa

customer_reviews.title: it works well overall and I like the cord management flap
customer_reviews.text: The phone in my LifeProof case fits into the arm band very snugly/tightly. Initially I wasn't sure I could get it all the way down into the sleeve but it does go if you push and wiggle it. That said, it works well overall and I like the cord management flap.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Henry

customer_reviews.title: It's very hard to get my phone in and out ...
customer_reviews.text: It's very hard to get my phone in and out of this....and to get it tight enough not to slip on my arm while running, it's uncomfortably tight.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Jo Swing

customer_reviews.title: This is cool that it can be used with your phone case ...
customer_reviews.text: This is cool that it can be used with your phone case still attached to your phone but If you have a beats headphones like I do then you cannot plug it in because of the bottom so I had to use reg headphones. Other than that it's ok.

customer_reviews.title: Great phone holder
customer_reviews.text: Keeps your phone in place on your arm while running.

customer_reviews.text: this is awesome!!! snug fit. a little tricky using the phone with the plastic cover, but it works. i'd give it 5 stars if it had a pocket for a key or a gym ID card.

customer_reviews.text: This is great! Easy to use and stays in place while I run. My husband and I each have one and recommend them!

customer_reviews.title: Fits great. Comfortable armband
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my roommate. She has a lifeproof case for the Iphone 5. Fits great. Comfortable armband, adjustable to needed size.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good armband
customer_reviews.text: Fits my Galaxy S5 with the case still on. Comfortable to wear.

customer_reviews.title: Armband for iPhone 6
customer_reviews.text: I I have an iPhone 6, and it does fit snugly in the armband. It is a little hard to remove because of the tight fit, but it gets the job done when I take my walks!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits the Galaxy S5 perfect. It fits both my smaller arm and my husbands much larger arm.

customer_reviews.title: Nice not having to take the phone out of the ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits my iPhone 6 with my Otterbox case on it. Nice not having to take the phone out of the case every time I workout. Well built and very durable.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: It should have been bigger for the s5.my phones got a protective glass and cover already so it's all beefed up.putting it into the armband might harm my cover.it's only fit for an iphone.m disappointed.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.text: I brought the Stalion sports armband for iphone for me, my husband was so inpressed he wanted one, so I brought the Armband for HTC phone and he just loves it. (GREAT INVESTMENT ) Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Roberta

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: A great armband. I am able to access my Droid phone without any trouble. Touch screen is not hindered. Overall, excellent product. Also great service, had it in a few days.
customer_reviews.author: Zero Rage

customer_reviews.title: Sport Armband for IPhone 5S
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I use it for jogging and walking with my iphone 5S. The case fits my iphone with a mophie juice case perfectly. Only drawback is that it is hard to see the phone face in direct sunlight. The plastic causes a glare sometimes.

customer_reviews.title: I loved it thank you
customer_reviews.text: I loved it thank you, I ran a half marathon and I was stressing because my new phone Samsung Galexy S5 did not fit my other running case so this came in just in time!
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia

product_meta.title: Tune Belt Model AB90 Armband for iPhone 11 Pro, SE (2020 2nd Generation), X/Xs, Galaxy S8 S9 S10e and Google Pixel 3/4 - for Running & Working Out - Sweat-Resistant (Black)
feature_bullets: CUSTOM FIT: Tune Belt makes armbands with different pocket sizes to custom fit your device & case - this model provides the best fit for iPhone 11 Pro, iPhone SE (2nd generation 2020), iPhone X Xs, Galaxy S8 9 S10e and Google Pixel 3 4 with NO case or thin case – To fit larger, see our Fit Guide in the images to this listing for your best fit recommendations
COMPATIBLE WITH: iPhone 6 6s 7 8 and Samsung Galaxy S6 S7 with no case or thin case
SWEAT-RESISTANT DESIGN: With no openings touching the skin and moisture wicking fabric, this sport armband provides excellent protection from perspiration and the elements

EXCEPTIONAL COMFORT: For women and men, the soft, cushioning fitness armband maintains a secure grip with comfort. It won’t bounce, slip or feel too tight allowing you to move freely through your exercise

MORE FEATURES: Cord wrap for preventing tangles when running or working out at the gym - Touchscreen control - Washable. RELIABLE BRAND: Tune Belt has over 30 years’ experience and a reputation for high-quality - this exercise armband will not tear or fall apart with regular use at the gym or outdoors
